RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since January 31 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELEGANT TASTE stalked the early pace and made a two wide bid on the turn, took over leaving the turn and was clear by the furlong marker, then remained clear to the wire to prove best, driving. WILL TAKE ROSES set the pace on the inside, was headed nearing the quarter pole, then angled out leaving the turn and ran on to the wire, second best. FAVORITE DOLL was allowed to settle along the inside, made a mild bid on the inside leaving the turn but had no late kick. SIMPLE SOUVENIR tracked the pace three wide and came four wide into the lane and weakened. DANCE A LITTLE JIG was void of early speed, saved ground and had a belated rally. MELODIA was settled back early and lacked a serious rally. AMI'S LINK chased the pace four wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance a Little Jig
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, saved ground, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Elegant Taste
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 2 wide, drew clear 1/8, kept clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Melodia
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Will Take Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed 1/4, angled out, ran on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Favorite Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside backstretch, mild bid inside, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ami's Link
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Souvenir
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, 3 wide backstretch, came 4 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 27100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPINNING MUSICIAN prompted the pace between rivals by the half mile marker, made a two wide bid on the turn to duel for command, then took over leaving the turn and drew off smartly to prove best under a drive. SNIP THE ROSES chased the easrly pace, three wide by the quarter pole and finished willingly for the place award. ON AN ISLAND prompted the early pace three wide, fell back on the turn and was four wide by the quarter pole, then kept on to best the rest. BOOK RUNNER passed the tiring rivals. ROCK ANNA ROLL set the early pace getting over to the inside, then dueled for the lead on the turn and weakened. GIUSEPPE broke in the air at the start, made a three wide middle move on the turn but weakened. FIERCE AND STRONG chased the early pace and stopped. SILK PRINCE failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Book Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Giuseppe
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, middle move 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Spinning Musician
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace between rivals 1/2, bid 2 wide, drew off, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blackstone Farm LLC, Dr. William Hess & Godolphin LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Fierce and Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Snip the Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide 1/4 pole, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Rock Anna Roll
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dueled turn inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: On an Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, fell back turn 4 wide, bested rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 31 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Wh ere Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASLUCKWOULDHAVIT was reluctant to load, then broke sharply and was soon clear to set the pace, then drew clear on the turn, then drew off in the drive to prove much the best under a mild drive. MITROPANOS prompted the winner three wide early, then tracked that rival on the turn and failed to go with that rival, second best. EGOT A POKER FACE stalked the pace four wide at the half mile marker, chased the pace on the turn and weakened, bested rest. BRANTLEYS BIG GUN was reserved early, came four wide into the lane and angled out in the drive and passed the tiring rivals. LILTONYTWOPHONES steadied leaving the eleven sixteenths, then shifted out and chased the pace five wide and then was empty the final furlong. SHARP RED EAGLE chased the pace on the inside and weakened. TURNS was void of early speed, came wide into the lane and had no rally. TURNPIKE BOB was allowed to settle on the inside and then failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Turnpike Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground turn, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Red Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, saved ground turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mitropanos
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, tracked turn, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Asluckwouldhavit
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, away alertly, set pace, clear turn, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Turns
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Liltonytwophones
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied 11/16, chased pace 5 wide, empty stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Egot a Poker Face
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide 1/2, chased turn, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Brantleys Big Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 4 wide, angled out, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 54. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUSTICE OR APPEAL set the early pace while clear, drew off on the turn and then held sway late to prove best under a mild drive. ARROGANTE was settled early, came four wide into the lane and closed well but too late, second best. ONE LAST FLING chased the pace four wide, then was three wide on the turn and weakened, held show award. BUSTIN WIDE OPEN was reserved early, angled out in the lane and had a belated rally to just miss the show award. COWGIRL SHINE was settled back early, came five wide into the lane and had no serious rally. LET'SGOSHAGDANCIN was settled early on the outside, came widest into the lane and had no rally. FINE ALEIGH chased the pace three wide early, then was two wide on the turn and then empty in the drive. SAMETIMENEXTYEAR failed to menace. IOANNA chased the pace on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Wide Open
ENTRY.OWNER: Valente Roddy J Bilinski Darlene and Alfred Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, angled out stretch, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Sametimenextyear
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Ioanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Fine Aleigh
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide 1/2, 2 wide turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Arrogante
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 4 wide upper stretch, closed, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Justice Or Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace, drew off turn, held sway late, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: One Last Fling
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide 1/2, 3 wide turn, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Shine
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came 5 wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Let'sgoshagdancin
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside, came wide upper stretch, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 77. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE MARCH 31, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 31 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POSITIVE FORCE stalked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to duel for command, then took over leaving the turn and was clear by the furlong marker, then held on late to prove best, driving. EARLY FROST was reserved early, came four wide into the lane, angled out nearing the furlong marker and closed the gap fast. TERPEYE was settled back early, came three wide into the lane with run, then was blocked in traffic nearing the furlong marker, then angled out by the sixteenth marker and closed fast. SHATTER ME pressed the early pace on the inside, then was shuffled back on the turn, made a two wide bid leaving the turn but flattened out. STORMY SPELL was allowed to settle early, made a five wide move nearing the quarter pole but flattened out. KATY THE CAT was settled back early and then made a inside run on the turn but had no late rally. SERENE WARRIOR chased the early pace, made a three wide bid on the turn and was in between rivals by the quarter pole but weakened the final furlong. SOUTH HOUSE chased the pace three wide, made a four wide bid nearing the quarter pole and was in between rivals by the quarter pole, then was bumped and checked leaving the turn and weakened. SCHOOL OF THOUGHT failed to respond. SUSIKIN set a pressured pace two wide early, then dueled for the lead on the inside by the quarter pole and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Shatter Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, shuffled turn, bid 2 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Serene Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, bid 3 wide, between rivals 1/4, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Terpeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, 3 wide 1/4,traffic, blocked 1/8, angled 1/16,closed

ENTRY.NAME: Early Frost
ENTRY.OWNER: IBB Thoroughbred and Stem Brandon Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 4 wide, angled out, closed gap,

ENTRY.NAME: Katy the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, inside move turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Spell
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 5 wide move 1/4, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: South House
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, bid 4 wide, between 1/4, bumped, checked upper

ENTRY.NAME: Positive Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, clear 1/8, held on late, driving

ENTRY.NAME: School of Thought
ENTRY.OWNER: Brooks Gerald E and Hess Jr Carl L
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Susikin
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, dueled inside 1/4, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUY HERE PAY HERE stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid in hand on the turn to take over by the quarter pole, then drew off leaving the turn to crush foes under a hand ride. ROUND ROBIN was off a beat slow, settled back early, three wide by the quarter pole and finished well to be clearly second best. GREATEST WARRIOR stumbled at the start, settled back on the inside and saved ground on the turn and was along for the show spot. ALWAYS THERE lacked a rally. NEVER TOO MUCH was away alertly to set the early pace and was headed by the winner on the turn and faltered. J W RUNTOTHEBANK stalked the pace two wide and stopped. GRILLO chased the early pace and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: J W Runtothebank
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Round Robin
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, settled back, came 4 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Greatest Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: Bates Elizabeth and Stites William P
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, settled back, inside trip, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Grillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Always There
ENTRY.OWNER: McClellan Erin C and Saul Kenneth T
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Buy Here Pay Here
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide in hand, drew off, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Never too Much
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 31 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMAGISM prompted the early pace three wide, made a three wide bid on the turn to go on even terms for the lead by the quarter ;pole, then drew off after a couple right handed pops with the riding crop to prove much the best. HIGHWAY QUEEN was reserved early, came six wide into the lane and rallied well to gain the place award. CHARLOTTE WEBLEY bobbled slightly at the start, tracked the early pace four wide, made a four wide bid on the turn but flattened out, lost place award late. SAKARI chased the early pace two wide, swung out five wide leaving the turn and had no kick. FALL CAMPAIGN was settled early, saved ground on the turn and had no rally. PURELY SILVER set the early pace on the inside, then was headed and dueled with the winner by the quarter pole and weakened. BLEZNIATKA was settled back early and failed to respond. LOVE RAN RED tracked the early pace on the inside, eased out on the turn and came four wide into the lane and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Love Ran Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, eased out turn, came 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Purely Silver
ENTRY.OWNER: Wagon Wheel Farm and Farrell Brenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dueled inside 1/4, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Blezniatka
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Fall Campaign
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Highway Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 6 wide upper stretch, rallied, got 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sakari
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 2 wide, swung 5 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Imagism
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, drew off stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Charlotte Webley
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, tracked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, flattened out
